name: Tru Or Die: Chiraq
description:
Tru Or Die Chiraq, is a Multiplayer Roleplaying Survival Hood Game.
Release V1.0 Features
- Modular Clothing System
- Modular Chain System
- Music Industry System
- Fraud System with Crafting
- Stats / Attributes / Leveling System
- Advanced Weapon System
- Door Locking Mechanisms
- Furniture System
- Looting System
- Money Laundering System
- School System
- Early Vehicle System
- Thirst / Hunger System
- Weed Growing System
- Drug Dealer System
- Black Market System
- In App Purchases
- Pawn Shop System
- Emote System
- Proximity Chat System (VOIP)
- Text Chat System
- Police System
- Melee Fighting System
& Much more to come in Future Updates.
